item.description:
Downward Doggin' on Sunday's - 

Hey yoga lovers, both Newbies and advanced levels welcome. Have you ever wanted to try a yoga class?  Or, a yoga class...Outside?  Let us celebrate the warmer days and beautiful New England landscape by practicing yoga near the water in June!

B. Y. O. M. (Bring your own mat) - we do have a few extras for you to borrow, but let us know beforehand.

The class will run for three Sunday mornings at Webb Memorial State Park off Route 3A in North Weymouth (there is a parking lot).  It is scheduled to start on Sunday, June 5th from 10 am to 11:15 am.  The class will start at 10 am - 11:15 am, so please arrive a few minutes early to set your mat up and sign up.  All the yoga sessions will be on the first three Sundays in June (June 5th, June 12th, and June 19th)  June 26th is open for an unforeseen rain make up class.

The certified yoga instructor, Lee, has been teaching for 6 years and remains an active teacher in corporate wellness centers, YMCA, area fitness centers, among other destination tropical locations.  She enjoys making all yoga levels feel welcome and also challenges the advanced yogi.

All levels welcome, and the price for drop in class is $9.  Please bring cash, and sign yourself in on the class attendance list.  (The exception is the people that paid for the 3-pack class).

What you may want to bring with you... Yoga Mat, Water, towel, and wear comfy clothes preferably layers of clothing so if you get hot, you will be comfortable.  

If it rains, a make up session will be the last Sunday in June...and will be posted or sent through email a few hours beforehand.

The event will close at 8 am every Sunday morning, so please RSVP for each Sunday before 8 am on each Sunday.

 

Thanks, and see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Webb Memorial Park is located on Neck Street, which turns into River (on 3A in Weymouth - across from Dunkin Donuts) - follow past the beach and drive all the way to the end. We will be waiting next to the entrance.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Downward Doggin' on Sundays
